message: I  love TripIt Pro. Great gate notifications and updates.
I also use TripIt Pro, works great for me
Yeah, I'm with TripIt Pro also. So worth it. and really funny if I know about gate changes before anybody else on the old gate does bc Tripit is way faster then the officially announcement..
TripIt Pro seems pretty cool. @Bob and @marcelfahle how is the rewards monitor? is there a list of supported rewards?

@AroonUp you mean the refunds? Didn't get any so far (using pro since 3 months), but I read pretty cool stories of this feature. The Point Tracker is also nice if you collect miles on multiple airlines.. I'm only on Lufthansa so it's not that spectacular in my case, but neat..
I'm using the point tracker across a couple airlines, but it's not a feature I really care about because I don't redeem points very often
I'm on regular Tripit, it's awesome

I don't really have points with airlines, more so hotels. Do they track those? How broad is their tracker? Does it just cover the main rewards (i.e. Starwoods, HHonors) or does it go for bank rewards as well?
I use the free version of Tripit combined with FlightTrack Pro on Android for flight and gat notifications (imports automatically from Tripit)
@AroonUp I'm not really sure about tripit, but gomiles.com does for sure..
Thanks @marcelfahle - do they have a list of supported reward miles? I've looked everywhere! Was going to just signup and see otherwise.

@AroonUp I couldn't find a list. But as far as I remember, are they offering a trial version of pro you can cancel anytime.. So you can go just in there and look it up.. But yeah, a list would be helpful. Oh, and they do hotels and rental cars..
